languages.text: "Варп-секстант не откликается на команды. Дух корабля свирепо отвергает наши молитвы. Провожу вычисление обращения, что умилостивит благородного духа".
"The warp sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."
languages.original_text: "Варп-секстант не откликается на команды. Дух корабля свирепо отвергает наши молитвы. Провожу вычисление обращения, что умилостивит благородного духа".

traits.locale_text: "The warp-sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."
"The warp-sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."
"The warp-sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."
"The warp-sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."
"The warp-sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."

languages.text: "Der Warp-Sextant reagiert nicht auf Befehle. Der Geist des Schiffs weist unsere Gebete aus Zorn zurück. Ich berechne derzeit ein Gesuch, das den edlen Geist möglicherweise besänftigen wird."
languages.original_text: "The warp sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Der Warp-Sextant reagiert nicht auf Befehle. Der Geist des Schiffs weist unsere Gebete aus Zorn zurück. Ich berechne derzeit ein Gesuch, das den edlen Geist möglicherweise besänftigen wird."

languages.text: « Le sextant Warp ne répond plus aux commandes. L'esprit du vaisseau est en colère et rejette nos prières. Je suis en train de calculer quelle supplique pourrait apaiser le noble esprit. »
languages.original_text: "The warp sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."

traits.locale_text: « Le sextant Warp ne répond plus aux commandes. L'esprit du vaisseau est en colère et rejette nos prières. Je suis en train de calculer quelle supplique pourrait apaiser le noble esprit. »

languages.text: “亚空间六分仪对指令没有任何反应，飞船的机魂愤怒地拒绝了我们的祈祷。我正在考虑向它进行祈求，或许这么做可以安抚尊贵的机魂。”
languages.original_text: "The warp sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."

traits.locale_text: “亚空间六分仪对指令没有任何反应，飞船的机魂愤怒地拒绝了我们的祈祷。我正在考虑向它进行祈求，或许这么做可以安抚尊贵的机魂。”

languages.text: 「ワープセクスタントが指示に従っていない。船の精神が怒って我々の祈祷を拒否しているのです。今、その高潔な精神をなだめすかす口実を考えているところです」
languages.original_text: "The warp sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."

traits.locale_text: 「<歪み>セクスタントが指示に従っていない。船の精神が怒って我々の祈祷を拒否している。今、その高潔な精神をなだめすかす口実を考えているところだ」
「ワープセクスタントが指示に従っていない。船の精神が怒って我々の祈祷を拒否しているのです。今、その高潔な精神をなだめすかす口実を考えているところです」

languages.text: «El sextante de la disformidad no responde a los comandos. El espíritu de la nave rechaza airado nuestras plegarias. Estoy calculando una súplica que pueda apaciguar a este noble espíritu».
languages.original_text: "The warp sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."

traits.locale_text: «El sextante de la disformidad no responde a los comandos. El espíritu de la nave rechaza airado nuestras plegarias. Estoy calculando una súplica que pueda apaciguar a este noble espíritu».

languages.text: "Öteboyut sekstantı, komutlara yanıt vermiyor. Geminin ruhu dualarımızı öfkeyle reddediyor. Şu anda asil ruhun gönlünü alabilecek bir yakarış hesaplamaktayım."
languages.original_text: "The warp sextant is not responding to commands. The ship's spirit is rejecting our prayers in anger. I am currently calculating a plea that might appease the noble spirit."

traits.locale_text: "Öteboyut sekstantı komutlara yanıt vermiyor. Geminin ruhu dualarımızı öfkeyle reddediyor. Şu anda soylu ruhuna tesir edebilecek bir yakarış hesaplamaktayım."
